name: Risky Run Endless Runner Game
description:
Risky Rescue Run, Free Endless runner arcade game: Help Manolo to escape all the dangers and get to his beloved Macarena, or kill him in the attempt !
Maintain all your senses in full alert and pick up all the fruits with Manolo while jumping, rolling and dodging obstacles. .Unlock new levels, characters, obstacles and scenarios. Get the special objects through 50 free levels full of challenges and enjoyment.

Characteristics:
- Dodge bulls, vultures, dogs, wheels, boxes, stones and other obstacles.
- Run through 50 free levels with different scenarios.
- Discover new challenges and obstacles in each level.
- Get all the stars from each level by finding the special objects: diamonds and fruit baskets.

Send comments for this arcade game to riskyrungame@gmail.com

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/RiskyRunGame
Risky Run web: http://Riskyrun.wixsite.com/riskyrun
